aistros-foundary.description: Local AI via Foundry (DeepSeek-R1) + RAG - project context retrieval, code generation, documentation search

aistros-gemini.description: Google Gemini AI server - horoscope generation, AI Shaman consultations, text generation, token counting

aistros-huggingface.description: HuggingFace Inference API server - text generation with various models, horoscopes, chat completion

aistros-orchestrator.description: Orchestrator - —Ç—Ä—ë—Ö—Å—Ç–æ—Ä–æ–Ω–Ω—è—è –∏–Ω—Ç–µ–≥—Ä–∞—Ü–∏—è MariaDB ‚Üî Foundry AI ‚Üî WordPress, workflow automation

aistros-mariadb.description: MariaDB database server –¥–ª—è AiStros - READ-only SQL, user personas, token stats, multisite (73 languages)

aistros-wordpress.description: WordPress REST API server - posts, pages, users, plugins, horoscopes CPT, WooCommerce products

aistros-astro-systems.description: Astrological systems server - 25+ systems (Western, Vedic, Chinese), zodiac calculations, compatibility

aistros-user-login.description: User authentication server - AJAX login, SSO tokens, session management, user profile validation, multisite support

aistros-language-detection.description: Language detection and localization server - browser language detection, automatic redirect, cookie management, multisite support (73 languages)

aistros-translation.description: Translation server - LibreTranslate API, 23+ languages, horoscope translation, content localization

aistros-plugin-diagnostics.description: Plugin diagnostics server - check all plugins status, analyze debug.log, system health, Gemini Connector verification, instant plugin status reports

aistros-php.description: PHP Server MCP - execute PHP code, manage WordPress

aistros-smtp.description: SMTP Server MCP - send emails, manage mail configuration

aistros-keepass.description: KeePass KDBX server - manage passwords, list entries, get credentials

aistros-ssh.description: SSH remote access server - execute commands, file operations, WP-CLI, log monitoring

aistros-ftp.description: FTP file transfer server - upload/download, directory management, WordPress backup

powershell-stdio.description: Custom PowerShell STDIO server for executing arbitrary commands with elevated privileges (Python wrapper)

aistros-powershell-https.description: PowerShell HTTPS REST API server on port 8090

aistros-wordpress-cli.description: WordPress CLI server for WP-CLI commands

github.description: GitHub API integration - repos, issues, PRs
